name: Dropped Item
description: Entity representing in-game items. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: 0.25x0.25 block hitbox. Despawns after 5 minutes (6000 ticks). Merges stacks within 2s. Strategic: Use hopper minecarts for automated collection.

name: Experience Orb
description: XP source for enchanting. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Orbs merge when within 2.5 blocks. Small (1-3 XP), Medium (4-7 XP), Large (8-11 XP). Despawns after 5 minutes.

name: Area Effect Cloud
description: Lingering potion effect. Health: N/A. Damage: Varies by potion (e.g., Harming: 6❤️/s). Duration: 30s to 8 minutes. Technical: Created by splash/lingering potions or dragon breath.

name: Elder Guardian
description: Ocean monument boss. Health: 80 HP (40❤️). Damage: Laser (6❤️/1.5s) + Mining Fatigue III. Drops: 0-2 prismarine shards (60%), 0-1 prismarine crystal (33%). Strategy: Break line of sight with walls.

name: Wither Skeleton
description: Nether fortress mob. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: Stone sword (4❤️) + Wither effect (10s). Drops: Wither skull (2.5%), coal (33%). Strategy: Lure to Nether wart farms.

name: Stray
description: Frozen skeleton. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: Slowness arrow (0:30 effect). Drops: 0-2 arrows (50%), tipped arrows (8.5%). Strategy: Farm in icy biomes.

name: Egg
description: Chicken projectile. Health: N/A. Damage: Knockback only. Technical: 1/8 chance to spawn chick. Strategic: Use for automatic chicken farms.

name: Lead Knot
description: Leash attachment point. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Persists until broken. Strategic: Use for animal pens.

name: Painting
description: Decorative wall art. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: 26 variants (sizes 1x1 to 4x4). Drops: Painting item (100%).

name: Arrow
description: Ranged projectile. Health: N/A. Damage: 1-4❤️ (depends on bow power). Technical: 20% chance to drop after hitting. Strategy: Infinity bows bypass ammo.

name: Snowball
description: Throwable projectile. Health: N/A. Damage: Knockback only. Technical: 16 max stack. Strategy: Use against blazes (3❤️ damage).

name: Ghast Fireball
description: Ghast explosive attack. Health: N/A. Damage: 9❤️ (radius 3 blocks). Technical: Deflect with melee. Strategy: Use for Netherrack mining.

name: Blaze Fireball
description: Blaze projectile. Health: N/A. Damage: 5❤️ direct + 2❤️ splash. Technical: Lights blocks on fire. Strategy: Snowball counterattack.

name: Ender Pearl
description: Teleportation item. Health: N/A. Damage: 2.5❤️ on use. Technical: 5% endermite spawn chance. Strategy: Use for parkour shortcuts.

name: Eye of Ender
description: Stronghold locator. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: 20% break chance per use. Strategy: Craft 12 for portal activation.

name: Splash Potion
description: Throwable effect container. Health: N/A. Damage: Varies (e.g., Harming: 6❤️). Technical: 4-block radius. Strategy: Use Lingering for traps.

name: Bottle o' Enchanting
description: XP source. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Grants 3-11 XP. Strategy: Farm from cleric villagers.

name: Item Frame
description: Item display. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Rotate with right-click. Drops: Item + frame (100%).

name: Wither Skull
description: Wither projectile. Health: N/A. Damage: 8❤️ explosion. Technical: Blue skulls bypass armor. Strategy: Deflect with cobblestone.

name: Primed TNT
description: Activated explosive. Health: N/A. Damage: 65❤️ (radius 7 blocks). Technical: 4-second fuse. Strategy: Use for quarry mining.

name: Falling Block
description: Gravity-affected block. Health: N/A. Damage: Crushing (varies by block). Technical: Converts to item on landing. Strategy: Use for sand/gravel traps.

name: Firework Rocket
description: Elytra booster. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Duration = (gunpowder +1)s. Strategy: Use 3x gunpowder for max boost.

name: Husk
description: Desert zombie. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: Hunger effect (0:30). Drops: Rotten flesh (0-2), sand (rare). Strategy: Avoid in early-game.

name: Spectral Arrow
description: Glowing projectile. Health: N/A. Damage: 1-4❤️ + 10s glow. Technical: Crafted with glowstone. Strategy: Track hidden mobs.

name: Shulker Bullet
description: Shulker projectile. Health: N/A. Damage: 4❤️ + Levitation (10s). Technical: Destroy with melee. Strategy: Use Slow Falling potions.

name: Dragon Fireball
description: Dragon explosive. Health: N/A. Damage: 12❤️ + lingering cloud. Technical: Breaks most blocks. Strategy: Hide behind obsidian.

name: Zombie Villager
description: Curable zombie. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: 2❤️. Technical: Cure with Weakness + Golden Apple. Strategy: Discount trading source.

name: Skeleton Horse
description: Undead mount. Health: 15 HP (7.5❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: 0.75% lightning spawn chance. Strategy: Immune to drowning.

name: Zombie Horse
description: Unridable undead. Health: 15 HP (7.5❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Command-only spawn. Strategy: Decoration only.

name: Armor Stand
description: Gear display. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Pose with redstone. Drops: Stand + equipped items.

name: Donkey
description: Storage mount. Health: 15-30 HP (varies). Damage: N/A. Technical: 15 inventory slots. Strategy: Breed with golden apples.

name: Mule
description: Donkey-horse hybrid. Health: 15-30 HP. Damage: N/A. Technical: 15 slots + unbreedable. Strategy: Immune to zombie infection.

name: Evocation Fangs
description: Evoker attack. Health: N/A. Damage: 6❤️. Technical: Passes through shields. Strategy: Jump to avoid.

name: Evoker
description: Mansion spellcaster. Health: 24 HP (12❤️). Damage: Fangs (6❤️) + Vex summon. Drops: Totem of Undying (100%).

name: Vex
description: Evoker minion. Health: 14 HP (7❤️). Damage: Iron sword (3❤️). Technical: 2-minute lifespan. Strategy: Ignore, focus on Evoker.

name: Vindicator
description: Axe-wielding illager. Health: 24 HP (12❤️). Damage: 7❤️ (axe). Drops: Emerald (50%). Strategy: Use shields.

name: Illusioner
description: Unused illager. Health: 32 HP (16❤️). Damage: Bow (2-5❤️). Technical: Command-only spawn. Strategy: No drops.

name: Minecart with Command Block
description: Redstone component. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Requires operator access. Strategy: Automated command systems.

name: Boat
description: Water vehicle. Health: N/A. Damage: Breaks into planks. Technical: Fishes in water. Strategy: Ice highway travel.

name: Minecart
description: Rail vehicle. Health: N/A. Damage: Knockback. Technical: Speed 8m/s. Strategy: Use powered rails for boosts.

name: Storage Minecart
description: Minecart with inventory. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: 27 storage slots. Strategy: Link to hoppers for automated item transport.

name: Powered Minecart
description: Coal-fueled minecart. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Pushes other minecarts. Strategy: Use for engine-powered rail systems.

name: Minecart with TNT
description: Explosive rail vehicle. Health: N/A. Damage: 65❤️ (radius 7 blocks). Technical: Detonates via activator rail. Strategy: Use for tunnel blasting.

name: Minecart with Hopper
description: Item-collecting minecart. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Pulls items at 2.5s intervals. Strategy: Use for automated farms.

name: Minecart with Spawner
description: Mobile spawner. Health: N/A. Damage: N/A. Technical: Requires spawn egg. Strategy: Decoration or custom mob farms.

name: Creeper
description: Explosive mob. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: 49❤️ (point-blank). Technical: Charged by lightning. Strategy: Use cats to deter.

name: Skeleton
description: Bow-wielding undead. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: 1-4❤️ (arrow). Technical: Burns in sunlight. Strategy: Farm for bones/arrows.

name: Spider
description: Climbing arachnid. Health: 16 HP (8❤️). Damage: 2❤️ (melee). Technical: Spawns in darkness. Strategy: Use light to prevent spawns.

name: Giant Zombie
description: Unused mob. Health: 100 HP (50❤️). Damage: 26❤️ (melee). Technical: Command-only spawn. Strategy: Decorative use.

name: Zombie
description: Basic undead. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: 2❤️ (melee). Technical: Converts villagers. Strategy: Farm for rotten flesh.

name: Slime
description: Bouncy cube. Health: Varies by size (1-16 HP). Damage: 1-4❤️. Technical: Splits when killed. Strategy: Farm slimeballs for sticky pistons.

name: Ghast
description: Floating Nether mob. Health: 10 HP (5❤️). Damage: 9❤️ (fireball). Technical: Deflect projectiles. Strategy: Farm ghast tears for regeneration potions.

name: Zombie Pigman
description: Neutral Nether mob. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: 5❤️ (sword). Technical: Aggro on hit. Strategy: Farm gold nuggets.

name: Enderman
description: Teleporting mob. Health: 40 HP (20❤️). Damage: 6❤️ (melee). Technical: Water/rain damage. Strategy: Trap in boats for farming.

name: Cave Spider
description: Poisonous arachnid. Health: 12 HP (6❤️). Damage: 2❤️ + Poison (0:07). Technical: Found in mineshafts. Strategy: Use milk to cure poison.

name: Silverfish
description: Infesting mob. Health: 8 HP (4❤️). Damage: 1❤️. Technical: Summons others when attacked. Strategy: Avoid infested blocks.

name: Blaze
description: Fire-shooting mob. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: 5❤️ (fireball). Technical: Weak to snowballs. Strategy: Farm blaze rods for brewing.

name: Magma Cube
description: Lava slime. Health: Varies by size (1-16 HP). Damage: 1-4❤️. Technical: Immune to fire. Strategy: Farm magma cream for potions.

name: Ender Dragon
description: Final boss. Health: 200 HP (100❤️). Damage: 10❤️ (charge). Technical: Healed by crystals. Strategy: Destroy crystals first.

name: Wither
description: Summoned boss. Health: 300 HP (150❤️). Damage: 8❤️ (skull explosion). Technical: Destroys blocks. Strategy: Fight in obsidian tunnels.

name: Bat
description: Passive cave mob. Health: 6 HP (3❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Spawns in darkness. Strategy: Indicates nearby caves.

name: Witch
description: Potion-throwing mob. Health: 26 HP (13❤️). Damage: Harming potions (6❤️). Technical: Drops glowstone/redstone. Strategy: Use arrows for range.

name: Endermite
description: Tiny End pest. Health: 8 HP (4❤️). Damage: 2❤️. Technical: 2-minute lifespan. Strategy: Use to attract Endermen.

name: Guardian
description: Underwater defender. Health: 30 HP (15❤️). Damage: 6❤️ (laser). Technical: Spawns in ocean monuments. Strategy: Use Depth Strider.

name: Shulker
description: End city mob. Health: 30 HP (15❤️). Damage: 4❤️ (projectile). Technical: Teleports when hit. Strategy: Use shields to block.

name: Pig
description: Rideable mob. Health: 10 HP (5❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Saddle required. Strategy: Breed with carrots.

name: Sheep
description: Wool source. Health: 8 HP (4❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Dyeable. Strategy: Shear for wool blocks.

name: Cow
description: Leather source. Health: 10 HP (5❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Milk with bucket. Strategy: Farm for bookshelves.

name: Chicken
description: Egg layer. Health: 4 HP (2❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Lays eggs every 5-10m. Strategy: Auto-farm with hoppers.

name: Squid
description: Aquatic mob. Health: 10 HP (5❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Drops ink sacs. Strategy: Farm for black dye.

name: Wolf
description: Tamable companion. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: 3❤️ (untamed). Technical: Heal with meat. Strategy: Use against phantoms.

name: Mooshroom
description: Mushroom cow. Health: 10 HP (5❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Shear for mushrooms. Strategy: Breed in mushroom biomes.

name: Snow Golem
description: Utility mob. Health: 4 HP (2❤️). Damage: Snowball knockback. Technical: Melts in warm biomes. Strategy: Use for creeper defense.

name: Ocelot
description: Jungle cat. Health: 10 HP (5❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Scares creepers. Strategy: Tame with fish for cats.

name: Iron Golem
description: Village protector. Health: 100 HP (50❤️). Damage: 7-21❤️. Technical: Spawns in villages. Strategy: Heal with iron ingots.

name: Horse
description: Rideable mob. Health: 15-30 HP (varies). Damage: N/A. Technical: Speed varies by breed. Strategy: Use for fast travel.

name: Rabbit
description: Fast hopper. Health: 3 HP (1.5❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Drops rabbit’s foot (10%). Strategy: Farm for jump boost potions.

name: Polar Bear
description: Icy biome mob. Health: 30 HP (15❤️). Damage: 6❤️ (if provoked). Technical: Protects cubs. Strategy: Avoid during early game.

name: Llama
description: Caravan mob. Health: 15-30 HP (varies). Damage: Spit (1❤️). Technical: 3-15 inventory slots (with chest). Strategy: Use for item transport in mountains.

name: Llama Spit
description: Llama projectile. Health: N/A. Damage: 1❤️. Technical: 0.25s cooldown. Strategy: Avoid when angering llamas.

name: Parrot
description: Tamable bird. Health: 6 HP (3❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: Mimics mob sounds. Strategy: Dance to music discs for taming.

name: Villager
description: Trading NPC. Health: 20 HP (10❤️). Damage: N/A. Technical: 15 professions (librarian, farmer, etc.). Strategy: Cure zombie villagers for discounts.

name: Ender Crystal
description: Dragon healer. Health: Indestructible (except attacks). Damage: Explosion (6❤️). Technical: Crafted with ghast tear + eye of ender. Strategy: Destroy with snowballs.
